title: Contact Us
description: You can contact us by calling +62 813 3739 8840 from 9AM - 10PM or email at admin@balidentalclinic.com

title: First Information
description: Tell us your about your profile, current address, condition & symptoms

title: Meet The Doctor
description: After we receive your call & information, Doctor will visit you in your hotel or home. Our service level is 1 hour after we get notification

title: Medicine & Lab Check
description: You will get treatment & medication after we do some general check. If you need lab check, we will provide that to you

title: Report & Invoice
description: We will send your medical report and invoice through your email

title: Continuity of Care
description: Follow up call will be conducted 1-2 days after the treatment to make sure we do not lost any little things.
